last_episode_to_air.name: The Nemesystems Takeover
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Nemesystems overthrows the Tomorrowland Transit Authority, Mission Force One must face their biggest mission ever to take it back!

name: Miles from Tomorrowland
overview: This intergalactic adventure charts the outer space missions of young adventurer Miles Callisto and his family – mom and ship captain, Phoebe; mechanical engineer dad, Leo; tech-savvy big sister, Loretta; and robo-ostrich pet, Merc – as they help connect the universe on behalf of the Tomorrowland Transit Authority.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Set in the year of 2501. The Callisto family live on a spaceship called the Stellosphere and work for the Tomorrowland Transit Authority (TTA).

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Follows the outer space voyages of young adventurer Miles and his family.

seasons.name: Mission Force One
seasons.overview: Miles is now leading a team called Mission Force One, which consists of his sister, Loretta, and their friends, Haruna, Blodger and Mirandos as they continue their mission to Connect and Protect the Tomorrowland Transit Authority (TTA), while also dealing with a new threat: the Nemesystems.

episodes.name: Runaway Shuttle
episodes.overview: Miles and M.E.R.C. rescue a trapped pilot before his ship crashes into Jupiter's fiery moon, Io.

episodes.name: Surfin the Whirlpool
episodes.overview: On a father/son surf trip, Miles and Leo must work together to escape the Zuma Whirlpool.

episodes.name: Ocean in Motion
episodes.overview: Miles and his family must figure out why a probe stationed on a dry planet has sustained water damage.

episodes.name: Explorer Exchange
episodes.overview: The Callisto family is visited by alien Blodger Blopp as part of a Cosmic Explorers exchange program.

episodes.name: Game On
episodes.overview: When the Callisto family is captured by an alien queen, Miles must rely on his simulated gaming skills to save them.

episodes.name: How I Saved My Summer Vacation
episodes.overview: While vacationing on the dry planet of Alarbus, Miles and Loretta uncover an ancient secret.

episodes.name: Journey to the Frozen Planet
episodes.overview: During a mission on an ice-covered planet, Miles must save Loretta when she is swept down a river towards a waterfall.

episodes.name: Attack of the Flickorax
episodes.overview: When the lights go out on the planet Calpurnia, Miles and Loretta must protect their ship from light-eating Flickorax aliens.

episodes.name: Catch That IOTA!
episodes.overview: Miles' attempt to fix Leo's latest gadget sends a diplomatic dinner into complete chaos.

episodes.name: Mighty Merc
episodes.overview: Merc worries that his place with the Callisto family is threatened when they try out a new robot named Axel.

episodes.name: Who Stole the Stelloshpere?
episodes.overview: When space thief Gadfly Garnett sneaks onboard the Stellosphere and blasts away with Miles and M.E.R.C. still inside, Miles' UNCLE Joe, captain of the SpaceGuard, comes to the rescue.

episodes.name: Rock N' Roll
episodes.overview: When a moonquake traps the Callistos behind a rockslide, Miles must use his strength-enhancing Exo-Flex suit to save them.

episodes.name: Happy Captain's Day
episodes.overview: Miles, Loretta and Leo try to give Captain Phoebe a great Captain's Day by embarking on a difficult space task.

episodes.name: Planet of the Plants
episodes.overview: During a mission to Antheia, a planet completely covered with orange plants, the Callistos discover something stranger than the plants.

episodes.name: Ride of the Quarkons
episodes.overview: The Callistos encounter a pod of Quarkons blocking the Photon Superhighway.

episodes.name: Downsized
episodes.overview: When the Callisto family is accidently shrunken down by the Tomorrowland Mail-alien, the tiny family must work together to help Merc save an off-course starship.

episodes.name: To the Goldilocks Zone
episodes.overview: Miles helps scout out the perfect planet for his Earth friend Haruna to live on.

episodes.name: Hiccup in the Plan
episodes.overview: The Callistos must figure out how to escape when a giant Sporjot alien swallows the Stellosphere.

episodes.name: On Spaceguard
episodes.overview: Miles goes on a ride-along with his uncle, Captain Joe of the SpaceGuard, and finds himself in pursuit of space villain Gadfly Garnett.

episodes.name: Spaceship Invader
episodes.overview: Miles brings home a fuzzy rock to add to his collection and soon learns it is actually an alien life form.

episodes.name: The Great Blastboard Chase
episodes.overview: Miles borrows Leo's Blastboard without permission and discovers an alien dinosaur.

episodes.name: Adventures in Robot-Pet Sitting
episodes.overview: On a mission to transport robo-animals to their new families, the Callistos hit a road block on the Tethosphere.

episodes.name: Unplugged
episodes.overview: When the StarJetter crash lands on an uninhabited planet, the Callistos must survive without the help of technology.

episodes.name: Junked
episodes.overview: The Callistos must track down the culprit responsible for dumping trash into the orbit around the planet Alarbus.

episodes.name: Mama Merc
episodes.overview: Miles must help his family when a giant winged creature mistakes the Star Jetter for its egg.

episodes.name: Space Race
episodes.overview: Miles learns a lesson in sportsmanship when he enters the Tomorrowland Pilot of the Future race.

episodes.name: The Neptune Adventure
episodes.overview: During a field trip to Neptune, a malfunction causes the research station to flip over and sink.

episodes.name: Eye to Eye
episodes.overview: The Callistos encounter Spectryx, an alien who can only see in the infrared spectrum.

episodes.name: Yuri's Night
episodes.overview: On Yuri's Night, the Callistos are tasked with bringing alien musician Bootjet Groovestar to the Tethoscape.

episodes.name: I, Stella
episodes.overview: When Stella's system experiences a technical malfunction, Miles must figure out a way to fix it.

episodes.name: Frozen Food
episodes.overview: When the Callistos' have dinner at alien chef Lysander Floovox's new restaurant, their meal is interrupted by Gadfly Garnett.

episodes.name: Later Multivator
episodes.overview: Miles attempts to follow in his dad's footsteps by modifying the Stellosphere's multivator.

episodes.name: Lunar New Year
episodes.overview: Miles' grandparents join the Callistos to celebrate the Luna New Year.

episodes.name: The Hoverbike Diaries
episodes.overview: Miles is invited to go on his first hoverbike road trip with Leo and Captain Joe

episodes.name: The Search for Skellig Ro
episodes.overview: Miles and Loretta meet Master Skellig Ro, a legendary guru in the martial art Naxos

episodes.name: Endangered Species
episodes.overview: The Callistos must find a way to save a group of creatures that fight against them.

episodes.name: Blasteroid
episodes.overview: The Callistos discover a tiny race of creatures living inside an oncoming asteroid.

episodes.name: Magnetic Merc
episodes.overview: M.E.R.C. becomes magnetized after getting stuck in an interstellar dust cloud.

episodes.name: A Growing Problem
episodes.overview: The Callistos must use robots to save a planet from an invasive species of moss.

episodes.name: The Tardigrade Escapade
episodes.overview: The Callistos launch a search and rescue mission when a massive tardigrade escapes Dr. Rubicon's lab and gets lost in space.

episodes.name: Miles vs. The Volcano
episodes.overview: The Callistos search for Phoebe's missing sister Frida and must rescue her before Mars' volcano erupts.

episodes.name: Scavengers of Mars
episodes.overview: A scavenger hunt turns into a rescue mission when Miles' friend disappears.

episodes.name: Unexpected Ally
episodes.overview: Gadfly helps the Callistos locate stolen space equipment.

episodes.name: Skyrise
episodes.overview: Miles and his friends must act quickly when a new space elevator malfunctions.

episodes.name: Ghost Moon
episodes.overview: the Callistos are sent to investigate eerie sightings on a dark moon.

episodes.name: Stormy Night in a Dark Nebula
episodes.overview: The Callistos enter a dark nebula and find some spooky inhabitants.

episodes.name: Team Exo-Flex
episodes.overview: An Exo-Flex training session becomes complicated for Miles and his friends.

episodes.name: Dino World
episodes.overview: The Callistos search for the missing Professor Rubicon, who was last seen researching ancient dinosaur fossils.

episodes.name: The Pluto Rescue
episodes.overview: Miles, Loretta and Auntie Frida's trip to Pluto coincides with Commander S'Leet's plan to take over a planet.

episodes.name: The Taking of the Solar Express
episodes.overview: Miles and Haruna must stop Gadfly from a galactic heist of a new solar-powered space train.

episodes.name: The Space Trader
episodes.overview: M.E.R.C. volunteers to help catch the thief responsible for a slew of recent robot thefts.

episodes.name: The Quantum Cup
episodes.overview: Queen Gemma's family gets diverted on their way to compete against the Callistos in the Quantum Cup.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Sandelion
episodes.overview: The Callistos travel to the planet of Sandrosk to save a colony from a sandstorm.

episodes.name: The Mystery of Atlantix
episodes.overview: The Callistos are sent to Pipp's underwater hometown of Atlantix, but their mission is interrupted.

episodes.name: The Hitchhiker's Ride Through the Galaxy
episodes.overview: Mayhem ensues when the Callistos bring aboard a group of mischievous critters.

episodes.name: Escape From the Tethoscape
episodes.overview: When the Stellosphere is out of commission, Miles and Loretta call on their friends for help.

episodes.name: The Discovery Expedition
episodes.overview: The Callistos' Christmas trip is interrupted by a villain named S'leet who causes it to snow inside the Tethoscape!

episodes.name: Snow Globe
episodes.overview: Loretta discovers a hidden planet full of snow and ice.

episodes.name: Galactech: Secrets of the Black Hole
episodes.overview: When a black hole reveals a clue left by an ancient race, the Callistos discover a secret galaxy containing the key to saving their own.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Set in the year of 2501. The Callisto family live on a spaceship called the Stellosphere and work for the Tomorrowland Transit Authority (TTA).

episodes.name: Galactech: Captain Miles
episodes.overview: When Miles gets the opportunity to captain the Stellosphere, his skills are put to the test when he must save his family and Professor Rubicon.

episodes.name: The Search for Spot
episodes.overview: The TTA assigns the Callistos to recover a robot on the Planet Trexor.

episodes.name: The Blobbysitters
episodes.overview: While Miles and Blodger babysit the Blopp twins, they take a ride on an experimental new vehicle.

episodes.name: Astro-Cavers
episodes.overview: Miles' eagerness to go Astro-caving with Uncle Joe and the Cosmic Explorers makes him overlook his preparations.

episodes.name: Galactech: How to Build a Robot-Pet
episodes.overview: Blodger is excited to get his very own robot-pet.

episodes.name: Career Day
episodes.overview: Miles goes on a mail run with Mr. Xylon on Career Day.

episodes.name: Galloping Groundshakers
episodes.overview: The Callistos' family adventure becomes a race to save a rare species.

episodes.name: Galactech: March of the Robo-Penguins
episodes.overview: After a group of robo-penguins get lost in a blizzard, Miles and Mirandos help herd them home.

episodes.name: The Tiny Aliens
episodes.overview: Miles and Haruna's toy rockets inadvertently create problems for a colony of tiny aliens.

episodes.name: The Adventures of Jet Retrograde
episodes.overview: Miles makes a superhero movie as a birthday present for his dad.

episodes.name: Galactech: The Galactech Grab
episodes.overview: When Gadfly steals the Galactech Globe, the Callistos must work together to get it back.

episodes.name: Galactech: An Admiral Rescue
episodes.overview: After Watson and Crick lock themselves in a high-security lab, it’s up to Miles to free them.

episodes.name: Galaxia's Quest
episodes.overview: When Miles unlocks a secret level in his holo-game, he enters a mysterious world.

episodes.name: Galactech: Mission to the Sun
episodes.overview: The Callistos try to get Stella back after her probe gets lost in the Sun.

episodes.name: The First Day of Galactic School
episodes.overview: On the first day of school, Miles must help save his teacher Dr. Consilium.

episodes.name: Miles Underwater
episodes.overview: When Miles tries Leo’s new water maker machine, he accidentally floods the Stellosphere.

episodes.name: The Galactic Fair
episodes.overview: At the Galactech Fair, Miles demonstrates Leo's new Exo-Flex-X suit.

episodes.name: Unfair Getaway
episodes.overview: The Cosmic Explorers are on a mission to stop Gadfly from stealing the Young Inventors Pavilion.

episodes.name: Building Day
episodes.overview: Miles and Haruna's self-built vehicles cause the Cosmic Explorers to get trapped!

episodes.name: Galactech: Flight of the IOTAs
episodes.overview: Miles must stop a swarm of IOTA helper bots from taking over the Stellosphere!

episodes.name: Galactech: Still Rocketing
episodes.overview: Miles invites his grandparents on a mission to retrieve their long lost starship.

episodes.name: Merc's Night Out
episodes.overview: "M.E.R.C. accidentally sleep-rockets to a planet where robots don’t exist.

episodes.name: Space Junkers
episodes.overview: Miles and Leo’s scavenging trip turns into a mission to help a lost robot.

episodes.name: Help Us, Jet Retrograde
episodes.overview: Miles’ homemade movies are a success on an alien planet.

episodes.name: Blackout on Bloppsburgh
episodes.overview: When the planet Bloppsburgh loses power, the Callistos ask space meteorologist and storm-chaser Dr. Z to help find a way to restore it.

episodes.name: The Robot Thief
episodes.overview: Miles and the Cosmic Explorers' first TTA mission goes awry when the Construction Bots are stolen.

episodes.name: Back in the Groove
episodes.overview: Rockstar Bootjet Groovestar joins the Callistos on a mission to find his groove again.

episodes.name: Saving Lumaro
episodes.overview: The thief Gadfly aims to drill for Staridium on the planet Lumaro, so the Callistos must find a way to stop him.

episodes.name: Galactech: The S'Leet Heist
episodes.overview: When Commander S'Leet uses the Idea Lander to find a second Galactech Globe, it's up to Miles, Loretta, and Blodger to try to stop him.

episodes.name: Galactech: The S'Leet Fleet
episodes.overview: The Callistos attempt to catch Commander S'Leet, who has stolen all of the TTA ships.

episodes.name: Once in a Blue Moon
episodes.overview: Miles and his Cosmic Explorer friends go rafting on an alien planet to earn a rare holo-badge.

episodes.name: The Queen Gemma Dilemma
episodes.overview: When Queen Gemma leads the Cosmic Explorers on a bird watching hike, nothing goes according to plan.

episodes.name: Galactech: The Mystery of the Dinosuars
episodes.overview: When a planet full of dinosaurs is threatened by an asteroid, Miles and his family must unravel ancient secrets to save them.

episodes.name: Who Stole The Dinosaur?
episodes.overview: Space Trader Dashiell Scamp needs the Callistos’ help getting a dinosaur off his ship.

episodes.name: Nine Minutes 'Til Bedtime
episodes.overview: When the Stellosphere goes haywire, Miles and Loretta must fix it before their parents finds out.

episodes.name: Chasing the Stormchaser
episodes.overview: Miles and Loretta interview a stormchaser but soon become part of the story.

episodes.name: Galactech: Loretta‘s Lost BraceLex
episodes.overview: When Loretta can’t go on a school field trip, Miles volunteers to collect data for her BraceLex.

episodes.name: Gamechangers
episodes.overview: Miles and Loretta learn how to create their own holo-game.

episodes.name: Goon Baby Goon
episodes.overview: Gadfly creates a Baby Goon, a toddler who threatens the ship.

episodes.name: Beneath Europa
episodes.overview: The Callistos go on an expedition to Jupiter's moon Europa.

episodes.name: Callistos on Ice
episodes.overview: S'Leet freezes the Stellosphere in solid ice to steal the Arkstar.

episodes.name: Galactech: The Space Trader Strikes Back
episodes.overview: Dashiell Scamp uses a robot decoy of Watson & Crick to fool the Callistos for a heist.

episodes.name: Galactech: The Vanishing Callistos
episodes.overview: When the Callistos start disappearing one-by-one, Miles and Blodger must find them!

episodes.name: Galactech: The Search for the Plectrix
episodes.overview: Miles goes on a quest to find a lost musical instrument for his grandfather's birthday

episodes.name: Robo-Monkey Business
episodes.overview: After being stranded, Miles, Loretta and Merc get help from a robo-monkey.

episodes.name: Connect and Protect
episodes.overview: When Miles, Loretta, Haruna, Blodger and Mirandos complete their final Cosmic Explorer badge, they are promoted to the Mission Acadamy!

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Follows the outer space voyages of young adventurer Miles and his family.

episodes.name: The Great Space Train Robbery
episodes.overview: When the Solar Express is stolen, Miles and Loretta must sneak aboard to get it back on track.

episodes.name: Mission Pets One
episodes.overview: Miles must work with five unprepared robot-pets to stop Nemesystems.

episodes.name: Villain After Villain
episodes.overview: Gadfly Garnett offers to reveal a secret Nemesystems factory's location if Mission Force One can protect him.

episodes.name: The Discover-Bot Takeover
episodes.overview: Nemesystems reprograms the Discover-Bots to become robot thieves!

episodes.name: Invaders from Tomorrowland
episodes.overview: While retrieving a TTA probe, Miles and Blodger are captured by the planet's inhabitants.

episodes.name: Rise of the Mountain Crushers
episodes.overview: The team must race to stop giant robots from destroying the Tomorrowland Mission Center.

episodes.name: Battle for the Zenith
episodes.overview: When a Nemesystems' expert thief steals the Zenith, Mission Force One must catch their starship and retake it.

episodes.name: Mission Force Plus One
episodes.overview: During the TTA Open House, an alien kid stows away on the starship.

episodes.name: The Magsteeds of Infurnia
episodes.overview: Mission Force One investigates suspicious Nemesystems activity on an overheated planet hoping to save its native creatures.

episodes.name: Stranded in Space
episodes.overview: After receiving a distress call, Miles and Haruna must rescue a crewmember before their ship is pulled into a star.

episodes.name: Plant Transplant
episodes.overview: The team brings a much-needed fruit tree to a new TTA territory.

episodes.name: How to Build a Better Villain
episodes.overview: After Miles creates a video game villain, she takes on a life of her own and traps the team inside the game!

episodes.name: The Goopopolis Swindle
episodes.overview: Mission Force One must track down a precious statue after it's stolen.

episodes.name: Bots of Fury
episodes.overview: When their shuttle is stolen by Nemesystems, Watson and Crick become trapped inside!

episodes.name: The Accidental Captives
episodes.overview: Mission Force One is tasked with testing a squad of martial arts training robots.

episodes.name: The Junk Monster of Planet Crunkle
episodes.overview: Chunks of tech self-assemble into a junk robot and take over the recycling center!

episodes.name: The Lost Empire
episodes.overview: Mission Force One and Queen Gemma join forces to save her people from Nemesystems.

episodes.name: Face-Off
episodes.overview: After Zeno's A.I. drive is stolen, Blodger poses as the entire team to get it back.

episodes.name: The Big Escape
episodes.overview: The team discovers their ship has become a gift to an alien kid and must find a way to escape.

episodes.name: Grendel's Moving Castle
episodes.overview: Video game villain Grendel takes over Planet Alarbus and Mission Force One must win it back.

episodes.name: The Great Gadfly
episodes.overview: Gadfly Garnett becomes a beloved superhero to the People of the Peaks.

episodes.name: Shoom Balla Boom
episodes.overview: Miles teams up with space trader Dashiell Scamp to steal back his teleporting jump-coat.

episodes.name: Friend or FoeBot
episodes.overview: Mission Force One comes to the aid of a planet whose inhabitants are afraid of robots.

episodes.name: Deep Trouble
episodes.overview: When Commander Nemex tries to steal a cloaking device, Mission Force One rushes to save its creator: Mirandos' father!

episodes.name: Double Trouble
episodes.overview: Nemex uses robotic body doubles to steal a device.

episodes.name: Malison to the Rescue
episodes.overview: When Loretta's robo-monkey lands in enemy territory, Mission Force One teams up with a space thief to save her.

episodes.name: The Last Guardian
episodes.overview: Mission Force One works to save a powerful android from Nemesystems.

episodes.name: Sidekicks for Hire
episodes.overview: When Commander S'Leet's sidekicks are recruited by Nemesystems, Mission Force One helps rescue them.

episodes.name: The Illumin-Aliens
episodes.overview: The team rescues aliens whose special abilities help thwart a Nemesystems plot.

episodes.name: Villain Force One
episodes.overview: After Commander Nemex captures most of the Mission Force One crew, Miles must work with the galaxy's top villains to rescue his teammates!

episodes.name: Villain Force Two
episodes.overview: After Commander Nemex captures most of the Mission Force One crew, Miles must work with the galaxy's top villains to rescue his teammates!

episodes.name: The Suit Pursuit
episodes.overview: Bootjet Groovestar helps Mission Force One get their SpaceJets back.

episodes.name: Operation Groovestar
episodes.overview: Aggro steals the team's mission suits to pose as them during a heist!

episodes.name: The Space Station Situation
episodes.overview: When a portal to the past opens up, Mission Force One teams up with real NASA astronauts to save the International Space Station from getting stuck in the future!

episodes.name: Aggro's Jam
episodes.overview: While on a planet that makes everyone sing, Aggro tries to capture Mission Force One.

episodes.name: Sea Change
episodes.overview: A fleet of Nemesystems ships endanger a water-covered planet with malfunctioning engines.

episodes.name: Saving Silas
episodes.overview: Over-confident TTA cadet Silas sees the power of teamwork when Mission Force One joins him for a rescue mission.

episodes.name: Attack of the Arachno-Bots
episodes.overview: Nemesystems sends an invasion of robot spiders to an alien planet!

episodes.name: The Nemesystems Takeover
episodes.overview: When Nemesystems overthrows the Tomorrowland Transit Authority, Mission Force One must face their biggest mission ever to take it back!

3.name: Mission Force One
3.overview: Miles is now leading a team called Mission Force One, which consists of his sister, Loretta, and their friends, Haruna, Blodger and Mirandos as they continue their mission to Connect and Protect the Tomorrowland Transit Authority (TTA), while also dealing with a new threat: the Nemesystems.
